HeroSection.heroDescription: Connect, celebrate, and create memories. Our platform makes it easy to discover and organize events that bring people together.
HeroSection.feature1Description: AI-powered event scheduling that adapts to your preferences and availability.
HeroSection.feature2Description: Connect with like-minded people and build lasting relationships.

FeaturesSection.featuresDescription: Everything you need to build and manage thriving communities
FeaturesSection.featuresCTA: Open source and built for community builders

CommunityHighlights.highlightsSubtitle: Join these amazing communities and connect with like-minded people

WelcomeNewOrg.welcomeScreenDescription: Let's get your organization set up and running!

WelcomeNewOrg.welcomeScreenTasksPaymentDescription: Configure your payment settings to receive funds
WelcomeNewOrg.welcomeScreenTasksEventDescription: Start planning and creating your first event
WelcomeNewOrg.welcomeScreenTasksNotificationDescriptio: Reach out to your contacts with important updates

StripeConnect.stripeConnectInfoText: Our system uses Stripe to process payments for you. Please connect your accounts if you want to charge for your events.

DeleteAccount.actionCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
DeleteAccount.accountDeletedDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted. You have been logged out.
DeleteAccount.disableCommunications: Disable all marketing communications and newsletters
DeleteAccount.backToOrganizationDashboard: A community of tech enthusiasts driving innovation.
DeleteAccount.communityDescription: Una comunidad de entusiastas de la tecnología impulsando la innovación.
DeleteAccount.featureCommunityManagementDescription: Efficiently manage your community members, roles, and permissions with our intuitive tools.
DeleteAccount.featureAnalyticsInsightsDescription: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive analytics about your community's engagement.
DeleteAccount.featureEventOrganizationDescription: Plan, schedule, and manage community events seamlessly with integrated calendar features.
DeleteAccount.featureDiscussionForumsDescription: Foster meaningful conversations with customizable discussion spaces and moderation tools.
DeleteAccount.featureCustomizationDescription: Tailor the platform to match your community's unique needs and branding requirements.
DeleteAccount.featureCommunityEngagementDescription: Build stronger connections with tools designed to increase member participation and interaction.
